Tim Tang

Has about 5 years of experience doing end-to-end development of web applications for small startups and in the enterprise. In all contexts he strives to find simple, common-sense solutions to complex problems. Over the years he has worked with a wide variety of technologies. When not in front of a computer Tim enjoys spending time outdoors with his wife and little daughter or torturing himself by running long distances.

SUMMARY

Specialities:

  • More than 5 years experience in J2EE direction. Both in web development and backend service.
  • More than 2 years for Ruby/Rails web application development.
  • Familiar with Vim /Eclipse and others tools, and I like use them for both Ruby,Python and J2EE development.
  • Familiar with shell script and coffee script, and like to use Terminal and Vim.
  • Like using Linux/Mac OSX development.
  • Like running & swimming & reading.
